io.sarl.lang.core

Interface AgentContext


  • public interface AgentContext
    An AgentContext defines the boundary of a sub-system, and gathers a collection of Spaces. Each context has a default context that provides a basic interaction context.
    Version:
    $FullVersion$
    Author:
    $Author: srodriguez$

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Create an instance of space following the given specification.

    • Method Detail

      • getID

        UUID getID()
        Replies the identifier of the context.
        Returns:
        the identifier of the context.

      • getDefaultSpace

        EventSpace getDefaultSpace()
        Replies the default space of the context. The default space is assumed to be always an event-based space.
        Returns:
        the default space.

      • getSpaces

        SynchronizedCollection<? extends Space> getSpaces()
        Replies all the spaces defined in this context.
        Returns:
        the spaces.

      • createSpace

        <S extends Space> S createSpace(Class<? extends SpaceSpecification<S>> spec,
                              UUID spaceUUID,
                              Object... creationParams)
        Create an instance of space following the given specification. This function always creates a new instance of space. If you want to find an existing space prior to the creation of a new one, you should use getOrCreateSpace(Class, UUID, Object...).
        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the created space.
        Parameters:
        spec - - specification of the space to create.
        spaceUUID - - identifier of the new space.
        creationParams - - parameters to pass to the space constructor.
        Returns:
        the new space.
        See Also:
        getOrCreateSpace(Class, UUID, Object...), getSpace(UUID)

      • getSpaces

        <S extends Space> SynchronizedCollection<S> getSpaces(Class<? extends SpaceSpecification<S>> spec)
        Replies all the spaces that are implementing the given specification.
        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the replied space.
        Parameters:
        spec - - specification of the space to retreive.
        Returns:
        the spaces associated to the given space specification.

      • getOrCreateSpace

        <S extends Space> S getOrCreateSpace(Class<? extends SpaceSpecification<S>> spec,
                                   UUID spaceUUID,
                                   Object... creationParams)
        Retreive or create an instance of space following the given specification. This function tries to find a space that fits the given specification. If none wis found, this function create a new space in the same way as createSpace(Class, UUID, Object...).
        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the replied space.
        Parameters:
        spec - - specification of the space to create.
        spaceUUID - - identifier of the new space.
        creationParams - - parameters to pass to the space constructor.
        Returns:
        the new space.
        See Also:
        createSpace(Class, UUID, Object...), getSpace(UUID)

      • getSpace

        <S extends Space> S getSpace(UUID spaceUUID)
        Retreive, but do not create, an instance of space following the given ID. This function tries to find a space that fits the given specification. If none was found, this function replies null.
        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the replied space.
        Parameters:
        spaceUUID - - identifier of the space.
        Returns:
        the space, or null if there is no space found.
        See Also:
        createSpace(Class, UUID, Object...), getOrCreateSpace(Class, UUID, Object...)
